name: promises-challenges
description: 1. Clone this repository to your computer. Navigate to the new directory in a Terminal window. 1. Run `git remote remove origin` to disconnect from the class repo. Also, run `npm install` to install any necessary packages included in `package.json`. 1. Go to [GitHub.com](https://github.com) and create a new repository for your code (do not initialize with a `README`). Follow the instructions to add a new remote called 'origin' to your new repository. 1. Navigate to each of the four Challenge files and follow the instructions in each.
